law.catch_line: It is unlawful and a violation of this article for a carrier, insurance producer, or third party adm...
law.text: It is unlawful and a violation of this article for a carrier, insurance producer, or third party administrator to refer an individual employee to the Plan, or arrange for an individual employee to apply to the Plan, for the purpose of separating that employee from the group health insurance coverage provided through the employee's employer.
